Pre-Game Insights: Jose Ramirez and Yandy Diaz are the hottest hitters on the Cleveland Guardians and Tampa Bay Rays.
The Guardians are -126 moneyline favorites in this matchup with the Rays (+107).
The total is 8 runs for the game (with -116 odds on the over and -105 odds to go under).
The Guardians have won 61, or 65.6%, of the 93 games they've played as favorites this season.
Cleveland has a record of 45-22, a 67.2% win rate, when favored by -126 or more by sportsbooks this season.
The Rays have won in 36, or 45%, of the 80 contests they have been named as odds-on underdogs this year.
Tampa Bay has been victorious 19 times in 49 chances when named as an underdog of at least +107 or worse on the moneyline.
